Class LayersHandler

java.lang.Object
LayersHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
CanvasObserver
public class LayersHandler extends Object implements CanvasObserver

      Parameters:

    • moveLayerUp

      public void moveLayerUp(LayerData layer)
      moves a layer 1 step to the top if the layer is already the top most layer the layer will not move
      Parameters:
      layer - the layer that needs to be moved 1 step to the top

    • moveLayerDown

      public void moveLayerDown(LayerData layer)
      moves a layer 1 step down if the layer is already the bottom most layer the layer will not move
      Parameters:
      layer - the layer that needs to be moved 1 step down

    • selectLayer

      public LayerData selectLayer(Point pos)
      Select Layer takes in a position and based on this position will return the Top Most Layer at this gievn position null will be returned if there were no layers at this position
      Parameters:
      pos - the position in which you want to select a layer from

    • updateCanvas

      public void updateCanvas()
      used to refresh the canvas to update the layers state

    • updateCanvasSelected

      public void updateCanvasSelected(LayerData selectedLayer)
      used to refresh the canvas to update the layers state also refreshs the canvas to show the selectedLayer as being selected or marked as choosen simply a selectio border will be displayed on the selected layer
      Parameters:
      selectedLayer - the layer that will be rendred/refershed into the canvas as selected or choosen

    • mergeAll

      public LayerData mergeAll()
      merge all merges all the layers that exist also mergeAll replaces all the layers that used to exist with the newly merged all Layer
      Returns:
      a single layer containing all merged layers
